testcase.name: User Signin and Search for a product and Add it to cart
testcase.system-out: Given Launch the Application................................................passed And Check for list of broken links..........................................passed And Click on signin button..................................................passed When Enter the email and Click on Continue..................................passed And Enter Password and Click on SignIn......................................passed Then User loggedIn Successfully.............................................passed When User Search for product "iphone 16"....................................passed Then User clicks on Add to cart.............................................passed
